mapper.select:
select index_p_code "value", index_name "text" from tb_formula_template_detail where index_guid = (select index_guid from tb_formula_template
where start_date <= to_date(#{month},'yyyy-MM-dd') and end_date >= to_date(#{month},'yyyy-MM-dd') )
where start_date <= sysdate and end_date >= sysdate )
select p_year "pYear" , start_date "startDate" , end_date "endDate" from tb_formula_template order by start_date desc
